channel.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
channel.description:
I've been playing with my Dazzle dvc 100 a little bit:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LeAd3xgrYtw
Is how far i've got with composite, i'm planning to get s-video to make the quality like a hd pvr, can anyone rate this quality from a scale of 1-10 1 being shit 10 being amazing

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

8.5/10

Read full topic
item.source: Can you guys rate my quality?

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @CodyPkz1 CodyPkz™
item.description:
@CodyPkz1 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:14, topic:370060”][quote author=CodyPkz™ link=topic=466174.msg3410606#msg3410606 date=1290652616]

I used to have a dazzle, and trust me, S-video does NOT make it the same quality as a HD PVR.

I have a hauppauge HD PVR and it’s quality is 20 times better than my dazzle with S-video.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DLB7bOj3ng0

I’m not looking for a hd pvr, as long as people can see the video it’s good.
[/quote]

I know, I’m just saying don’t expect PVR quality from a dazzle with S-video. It’s still an improvement but just a bit.[/quote]Meh, it’s going to be better than my composite so i’m ok.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you guys rate my quality?

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“CodyPkz™, post:13, topic:370060”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=466174.msg3410603#msg3410603 date=1290652379]
I used to have a dazzle, and trust me, S-video does NOT make it the same quality as a HD PVR.

I have a hauppauge HD PVR and it’s quality is 20 times better than my dazzle with S-video.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DLB7bOj3ng0
[/quote]
I’m not looking for a hd pvr, as long as people can see the video it’s good.[/quote]

I know, I’m just saying don’t expect PVR quality from a dazzle with S-video. It’s still an improvement but just a bit.

Read full topic

I have a hauppauge HD PVR and it’s quality is 20 times better than my dazzle with S-video.


I’m not looking for a hd pvr, as long as people can see the video it’s good.

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“CodyPkz™, post:9, topic:370060”]Yes i’m sure, im rendering in sony vegas with 720x480[/quote]Capture in 720x480, not render. You’d be better off rendering in 720p or above.

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“CodyPkz™, post:6, topic:370060”]i am using .mpg dvd high quality[/quote]Is it the highest resolution? It doesn’t look like 720x480.

Here are some of mine. The ones that have lines were captures in .avi

The first one is fairly decent, the second one looks great (.mpg, 720x480) but is choppy, last two are ok.

item.title: Can you guys rate my quality?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Eh, not all too good. I’d advise using the highest bitrate, resolution, and probably use .mpg format, that’s always good. I’m stuck using .avi because my capture software fails me, but it still looks pretty damn good for an Easycap.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you guys rate my quality?
